attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A criteria for Immigration. a points system like used in australia.
points allocated on age, qualifications, skills, family etc, if you have enough points you will be allowed to enter the country to live and work, also all Immigrates will have to be able speak english.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
